contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 27, 1997 D National Championship of Great Britain (Second Section Final)
National Championship of Great Britain (Second Section Final) 20 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) national-finals-second-section
Second
Apocalypse for Brass (Symphony for Brass Band) [Gordon]
Symphony Hall, Birmingham, West Midlands, UK Rhos Silver were disqualified, but later contested this in a court of law; the judge decided that the band hadn't breached any rules and that the contest organisers had no justification to disqualify the band.
The judge didn't have any power to re-award the title and Rhos Silver didn't have any money left to pursue the second court case that would have been needed to see their result re-instated, so the result of the contest is ambiguous, with both Rhos and Bathgate listed as winners. The contest organisers paid all court costs.
March 6, 2010, 12:47 p.m. Sept. 18, 2017, 8:13 a.m.
